Garden cress on a window sill.

home.description: An all-in-one, eco-friendly building package to start your own mini-garden. Perfect as a gift for a loved one to introduce them to the world of gardening.

meta.title: @:be.boxsprout.shared.about
meta.description: Learn more about the vision of BoxSprout and who we are.

anis.title: Meet Anis
anis.description: Anis Sakkaf lives in Boortmeerbeek. He is a great developer and a very charismatic person. He founded BoxSprout in February 2019 (together with 3 other team members) as a way of sharing the experience of growing and nurturing plants.

martijn.name: Martijn Gilis
martijn.description: Martijn, a finance and insurance student, is somewhat the “jack-of-all-trades”. With the help of his creative mind, we designed our sales booth. On top of all, he is our social media guy, when you’re having contact with us, than this is the man you’re talking to!

philippe.name: Philippe Gilops
philippe.description: As a student tax accountancy, Philippe ensures accurate accounting of our company. In addition to his punctuality, positivity and motivation are also a few words that describe him accurately.

eduard.name: Eduard Monstrey
eduard.description: Eduard is the marketing boy of BoxSprout. He is always hardworking looking for new marketing opportunities and making new contacts. People like to describe him as a opportunist who is always on time and never misses a deadline.
